name.baseName: Breeding of large yellow croaker seedlings;Large yellow croaker fry;cage culture;Only trash fish feeding
大黄鱼育苗;大黄鱼苗;网箱养殖;仅鲜杂鱼饲养

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The system includes energy production (red), feed production (green), the main chain of aquaculture production (blue), and the production of other inputs (purple).
该系统包括能源生产（红色）、饲料生产（绿色）、水产养殖生产主链（蓝色）和其他投入品的生产（紫色）。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: 1 live-weight ton of large yellow croaker

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: The literature did not specify the sampling time. The researchers conducted household interviews in August 2017 and January 2018 in the coastal areas of Ningde City
文献未具体说明采样时间，研究者于 2017 年 8月份和2018年1月份在宁德市沿海进行入户访谈

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The prefecture-level city of Ningde comprises a group of districts and counties, of which Fuding city (A), Xiapu County (B), Fu’an city (C), and Jiaocheng district (D) are next to the sea and were included in our assessment. A total of 321 households were randomly sampled in the area in August 2017 and January 2018, and we analyzed the data from 292 households that had mariculture production during 2016.
宁德市地级市由若干区县组成，其中福定市(a)、霞浦县(B)、福安市(C)、交城区(D)临海，纳入了我们的评估范围。2017年8月和2018年1月，我们在该地区随机抽取了321户家庭，分析了2016年期间从事海水养殖生产的292户家庭的数据。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The cage seedling cultivation technology of large yellow croaker, the sea area is selected as small and medium wave area, the water depth at low tide is ≥8 m, the flow rate is smooth, the flow rate is less than 1.5 m/s, and the flow direction is smooth and stable. The sea area with high flow rate which can be controlled by technical measures can also be used as aquaculture area. Water quality should comply with the provisions of GB 11607, water temperature: 8 ℃ ~ 31 ℃; Salinity: 13 ~ 35. The area of a single cage is 16 m 2 ~ 100 m 2, and the net depth is 4.0m ~ 8.0m. Net mesh 3 mm ~ 15 mm, adjust the size according to the specifications of the fish, in order not to escape the fish as the principle. Only fresh and mixed fish ingredients are used for breeding feed.

大黄鱼网箱苗种培育技术，海区选择中小风浪区，低潮时水深≥8 m，潮流畅通，流速≤1.5 m/s，流向平直稳定；流速偏 大的可通过技术措施加以控制的海区也可以作为养殖区； 水质应符合 GB 11607 的规定，水温：8 ℃～31 ℃；盐度：13 ～ 35。 单个网箱面积16 m 2～100 m 2 ,网深4.0 m～8.0 m。网衣网目3 mm～15 mm，根据鱼体规格调整大小，以不逃鱼为原则。养殖饲料仅使用鲜杂鱼成分饵料。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The data set represents large yellow croaker seedling breeding using cage culture with exclusive trash fish feed. This aquaculture process is mainly applicable for mariculture facilities, particularly those around the Ningde city region, focusing on the cultivation of high-demand seafood.
该数据集代表使用网箱养殖方式并且仅以鲜杂鱼为饲料的大黄鱼育苗过程。这一水产养殖过程主要适用于周围宁德市区域的海水养殖设施，专注于培育高需求的海鲜产品。

mathematicalRelations.modelDescription: The literature refers to the ecoinvent database (v.3.5). In order to account for the variability of the studied system, Monte Carlo simulations were performed in R software (v.3.3.2) to model the correlation between unit process variables in LCA using copula function, which solved the correlation between process variables.Monte Carlo simulations were used in R software, with each cell process represented by a set of input parameters, a correlation matrix of geographical location and growth stages, 2000 iterations were used in the simulation, and the variability of the cell process due to inherent uncertainty, dispersion and unrepresentativeness was considered. Inherent uncertainty is included by assuming a coefficient of variation of 5%, spreads are calculated from primary and secondary data, and a pedigree approach is used to address unrepresentativeness. Dependencies between process chains are included by using dependency sampling in each iteration, as well as dependencies between processes

文献参考了ecoinvent数据库（v.3.5）。为了解释所研究系统的可变性，在R软件（v.3.3.2）进行了蒙特卡罗模拟，使用copula函数对 LCA 中单位过程变量之间的相关性进行建模，解决了过程变量之间的相关性。在R软件中使用蒙特卡洛模拟，每个单元过程由一组输入参数、地理位置和成长阶段的相关矩阵表征，在模拟中使用了2000次迭代，并考虑了由于固有的不确定性、分散性和不代表性而导致的单元过程的可变性。通过假设变异系数为5 %来包括固有的不确定性，价差由主要和次要数据计算，并使用谱系方法解决不代表性。通过在每次迭代中使用依赖抽样来包括过程链之间的相关性，以及过程之间的相关性

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: The allocation method used throughout the data analysis process is quality allocation, following the guidelines recommended by the British Standards Institution
整个数据分析过程中采用质量分配，遵循英国标准学会推荐的指南

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data comes from the average of actual survey data
数据来源于实际调研数据的平均值
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: Literature researchers constructed a life cycle inventory of mariculture production from both survey data and scientific literature. Primary and auxiliary data are collected for the growth stage to simulate other processes such as seed and juvenile production.
文献研究者从调查数据和科学文献两方面构建了海水养殖生产的生命周期清单。通过收集生长阶段的主要数据和辅助数据，以模拟苗种和幼体生产等其他过程。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Marín, T. et al. Resource Use in Mariculture: A Case Study in Southeastern China. Sustainability 11, (2019).
Marín, T. et al. Resource Use in Mariculture: A Case Study in Southeastern China. Sustainability 11, (2019).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.samplingProcedure: In Ningde City, Fujian Province, China, 115 large yellow croaker farming households were investigated, of which 18 households were used in the model calculation of this data
在中国福建省宁德市入户调研大黄鱼养殖115户，其中18户用于此条数据的模型计算
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this data set for Life Cycle Assessment (LCA), ensure that the geographical and methodological boundaries are defined as per the data collection regions of Ningde, which include Fuding city, Xiapu County, Fu'an city, and Jiaocheng district. Be aware that the assessed households were engaged specifically in sea-based cage aquaculture during the year 2016. This data set should be used with consideration of the particular feed type used (trash fish) and the production of energy, feed, and other inputs as segmented by color codes. Any system expansion or allocation procedures should also take into account the locale-specific practices and data from the sampled 292 households.
在使用该数据集进行生命周期评估（LCA）时，请确保根据数据收集区域定义地理和方法学边界，包含宁德市的福定市、霞浦县、福安市和交城区。请注意，所评估的家庭具体参与了2016年的海上网箱水产养殖。该数据集应考虑所使用的特定饲料类型（鲜杂鱼）以及能源、饲料和其他输入品的生产，这些都通过颜色代码进行了区分。任何系统扩展或分配程序也应考虑当地特定的实践和抽样的292户家庭的数据。

completeness.common:other: Input data include energy inputs, feed raw materials, transportation services, and other secondary inputs required during production and supply. Infrastructure and equipment are not included. Parental collection data were also not included due to the lack of reliable data and the small contribution to the final results
输入数据包括生产和供应过程中所需要的能源投入、饲料原料、运输服务和其他次要投入。基础设施和设备不包括在内。由于缺乏可靠数据，而且对最终结果的贡献很小，亲本收集数据也未包括在内

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
